website_summaries.verdict: Natural shades, a built-in grooming tool, and long wear make this eyebrow liner worth considering. However, it comes with some durability and longevity concerns.
pros: This mechanical, waterproof eyebrow pencil earns praise for resisting moisture and providing all-day wear
Fine point and pretty shades make it easy to fill in missing brow hairs while creating a natural look
cons: Pencil has been known to break apart
Product doesn't seem to last very long compared to others on our list

customer_reviews.title: VERY EXPENSIVE for the amount you get.
customer_reviews.text: First off, I do like the brow pencil on how it performs. The pencil hardness is just right and the thin point allows for great control of defining eyebrows precisely. HOWEVER, the amount of product you get for the price is simply ridiculous. After carefully testing the ability to retract the pencil, I was shocked to see that you only get less than one inch of the super-thin (1/16") pencil. I thought another brand was bad for offering about two inches of the actual product, but this is even far worse with less than half the diameter and length. Uploading a photo to warn unsuspecting customers. Needless to say, I won't be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: RescueMa

customer_reviews.title: BEST DUPE FROM ANASTASIA
customer_reviews.text: This is my all time favorite eyebrow helper! I’m a person on the go so all i do is eyebrows and lipstick nothing else (on a good day i’ll throw on some concealer to make my brows extra perfect) I bought the dark brunette color, it last pretty long. I fell asleep and i still had my brows in tact. So i recommend to the fullest!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: This works great! It's easy to apply and lasts all day
customer_reviews.text: I was wasting my money on the Anastasia brow pencil.. This works great! It's easy to apply and lasts all day. The color is perfect and looks natural.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Inch long pencil ???
customer_reviews.text: Just received my pencil, and already disappointed.... I opened it, and discovered the whole inch of it ! :) Tell me please is this really worth $8 ?
customer_reviews.author: Lovely Lady

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market.
customer_reviews.text: I love this pencil, works perfect, lines perfect and is great for filling in as well. I'm all about groomed nice brows! The little brush is perfect for prepping, little tip makes for perfect outlining. Dont hesitate, it's great. My only complaint, soft brown has a reddish tint which I wish they would rectify. The dark brown us just to dark.
customer_reviews.author: Karliepie

customer_reviews.title: Great pencil. Closest to the discontinued Maybelline define a brow dark blonde.
customer_reviews.text: This is the closest match for color and quality to Maybelline define a brow dark blonde that I can find. I have used Maybelline for years and was very upset that it is discontinued. This product is a great replacement . I am happy with this and i will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A R

customer_reviews.title: Annoying!  Both ends pop out of the handle every time you remove the lids.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most annoying brow pencil. Both ends pull out of the handle when you pull the lid off so you have to stop and insert it back into the handle every time you use it. If it was glued securely into the handle it would have been a good brow pencil but it's just too irritating to have to reinsert the ends every time you use it.
customer_reviews.author: sharpkids

customer_reviews.title: Not enough and it breaks
customer_reviews.text: The pencil goes on smooth and I love the look, but it kept coming apart ! After only a couple of uses the spool brush popped out of the case and the pencil part soon followed. The amount enclosed lasted only a few weeks as well. I’ll be buying something different now.
customer_reviews.author: JustJess

customer_reviews.title: Brow win!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite brow product! Pros: Cost Color - I use Blonde. I have dirty blonde hair that is more ashy than warm. I find this to pair perfectly! Texture- Easy to apply and blend to give natural look Spoolie is superior to many! Cons: I do feel like I run through this quicker than I should.
customer_reviews.author: alyxsheerheart

customer_reviews.title: Dark brunette applied very light handed better than light brown.
customer_reviews.text: I did not want an orange-ish or red-ish brown color because it would look fake, so I bought the dark brunette pencil. I believe most people would benefit from using the dark brunette applied with a very light hand rather than using a lighter (usually warmer) brown shade. My hair and eyebrows are medium-dark brown and the dark brunette works perfectly. I just color very light handed the top more transparent portion of my eyebrows and it gives the natural effect (not tattooed effect often seen on YT) that I like.
customer_reviews.author: countingblessings

customer_reviews.title: Does not Last Long
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this eyebrow pencil, however it did not last even a month, the eyebrow color would not twist up when needed. I tried shaking it down and a smidgen of a piece fell out. It was very disappointing. I was expecting the brow pencil color to be long as it length. I have never had even a twist pencil eyeliner that short. the color was nice and the pencil thin for the little bit it had.
customer_reviews.author: Mama G

customer_reviews.title: Possibly the Perfect Brow Pencil
customer_reviews.text: This is the most natural looking eyebrow pencil I have ever used, and I've used A LOT of them. The color is spot on for my dark blonde hair, that was light when I was young and darkened as I got older. It doesn't look splotchy, go on unevenly, and with one stroke of the spoolie on the end, just looks like a natural eyebrow. My new go to pencil. The consistency goes on with light touches, just the way it's supposed to, and it fills is light spots without clinging too much to the hair itself. Makes for an even looking brow.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Best brown for dark brunettes!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for darker brunettes. I used to use black to fill in my brows but it was just that but too intense. Any brown I tried was always too light and noticeable. This is the perfect in between and looks so natural. Super easy to apply and stays in place all day. Not greasy like some others I've tried. Love that it doesn't need sharpening too (who has time for that right?!) I have gone through about 4 if these already and have now subscribed as I realise it's the best!
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Good color but formula and point could be improved
customer_reviews.text: This is my first L'Oreal Paris brow pencil purchase and, overall, I would say it still needs improvement. Pros: The taupe color is good, although a little light - but no reddish undertones! The pencil width is excellent but the tip is flat - no way to sharpen it to a smaller point to draw tiny hairs The price is great Cons: The formula could be more creamy - it's a little dry Needs a better sharpener I am still searching for the perfect, reasonably-priced brow filler, but in a pinch, this will do...
customer_reviews.author: empiriGal

customer_reviews.title: BEST BROW PENCIL FOR BLONDE BROWS!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product on my nearly-invisible blonde eyebrows for years and it is my absolute favorite. The micro diameter of the pencil allows you to draw the individual hairs in which is much easier to control than the larger pencils I’ve used. It also stays on super well. I work out on my lunch breaks at my corporate office and never have to worry about reapplying my brows after work outs! I used to buy this pencil at target or Walmart but signed up for the Subscribe & Save feature on amazon and save myself a trip!
customer_reviews.author: EHop

customer_reviews.title: Good, but expensive for the amount you get.
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but it's actually very expensive. You get a super thin pencil and only about 1 1/4" - 1 1/2 " of it. I prefer the Maybelline brand of eyebrow pencil in the pink plastic case, available here on Amazon:  I noticed Maybelline also makes a very thin pencil like this in the soft brown color, which I am going to try next. It's here:  I also liked Maybelline's "soft brown" color better...it had a little gray in it to soften the color. You do get more control and a more natural looking brow with these thinner pencils. This is especially useful if you have thinner brows.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECTION
customer_reviews.text: If your like me you’ve been through your share of eyebrow products. I’ve tried everything! For me, this is my favorite product. Easy to apply and lasts long enough for my needs. Even more important comes in a shade that works for me. I’m a red head, more on the intense copper side. I’ve found brown tones seem too dark. Dark Blonde in this product is perfect. I love the small tip for easy and seamless application. I’m happy I found it here on Amazon as it’s not the easiest shade to find in stores.
customer_reviews.author: MissKelly

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Waste You Money
customer_reviews.text: I honestly don’t know how there are all these positive reviews on this product. The brow pencil is thin like the ABH Brow wiz pencil but the stick was hard and waxy, definitely NOT a dupe for the ABH pencil. It is much darker than I expected. It does not glide on and you really have to work to get the color to even show up, which ends up pulling out brow hairs and if you have thin eyebrows already, avoid this pencil. It is possible that I received an outdated product and maybe that is why the reviews vary so much but the pencil I received was rubbish.
customer_reviews.author: J.T.

customer_reviews.title: Less smudging.  Lasted 8-hour day.
customer_reviews.text: Pencil is thin, but comfortable to hold making short wispy strokes following brow lines. Noted some slight flaking upon application, but lead seems to cover this by pressing more firmly with pencil. Lead is not creamy, but soft enough to make a mark with little effort. Natural oils at brow could still smudge brow line if touched, because pencil is waterproof, not oil-proof. However, upon first test, this makeup did not smudge as easily as less expensive leads will by slightly touching the brow. Had to rub two or three times to remove makeup. Brow liner lasted 8-hour day and remained in place with one application. Color is true brunette.
customer_reviews.author: Scotspiration™

customer_reviews.title: Easy and lasts!
customer_reviews.text: I’m loving this brow pencil! I was previously using a powder and this is SO much easier and lasts longer. I have auburn hair and fair skin and the dark blonde goes really well with my natural eyebrow color. My only complaint is every time I pull off the cap for the spookiest brush, the whole brush comes off with it. Kind of a pain, just need to glue it. Otherwise a great product and I would imagine I’ll buy again when this runs out. Some people complain about the amount in the pencil, and while it’s not much, you don’t use very much, so it should last awhile.
customer_reviews.author: MamaG

customer_reviews.title: Brow definer with staying power.
customer_reviews.text: This brow pencil is so easy to use. The pencil itself is the perfect texture for smooth application without being gloppy or too stiff. Unlike powders that can easily bleed out, this stays put where you apply it. The brush end blend beautifully into a very naturally fuller brow for more symmetry & even color. I'm of that age wher the silver, whit & gray brows are starting to pop through & I sure don't want to pluck those bad girls, I'd have no brows left!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Anne J. Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Great product  but didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but it didn't last long. The pencil enables a perfect bow fill, but the pencil is really soft and kept breaking off, even though here was just the tiniest bit showing to use. I must have lost half of it through breakage so although it's a great product to use, it's not value for money,
customer_reviews.author: Mrs S D Birch

customer_reviews.title: Just As Good As The More Expensive Brands!
customer_reviews.text: I read a review about this product and decided I'd give it a try. I had been using a few much more expensive brands and thought that this L'Oreal brand would not stand up to the test.....well....I was pleasantly surprised. The review I read was CORRECT.....this L'Oreal brand was just as good if not better than the more expensive brands I had been spending a LOT of money for. This is now my new favorite brow product. It goes on smoothly, no skipping, consistently beautiful and does not wear off throughout the day. And you cannot beat the price!!! I am very pleased. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Julie K. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love
customer_reviews.text: I love this brow pencil! I used to use ABH BrowWiz but in my opinion this is just as good! I bought some to use in my salon as I do Brow Shaping/Tinting. I had a hard time finding swatches, so i hope this helps someone! Left to right is Blonde, Light Brunette, Brunette, and Dark Brunette. I personally use Dark Brunet, and I’m a level 4N hair color
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke off when tried to use
customer_reviews.text: I suppose I would have lived this product more if a piece did not break off every time I used it. It did not last very long. It seemed brittle or something. Seeing other people measure the amount of product tells me why my pencil was gone so quickly (since it broke off several times). Not worth the price. Use a different product. I’ve used other product and never had problems like this.
customer_reviews.author: korey

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good dupe for AB
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty good dupe for Anastasia Beverly Hills. It's a little more.. oily.. or maybe, waxy? I'm not sure what word I'm looking for, but it's not as dry as AB. But I can't decide if I think that's a bad thing or a good thing. It glides on smoothly, blends nicely, and gives a natural look (which is crucial since my daily makeup routine consists only of filling in my eyebrows). I usually set it with a light layer of brow powder, but it still holds up pretty well when I'm in a rush and skip the powder.
customer_reviews.author: Kloh

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!
customer_reviews.text: Holy moly!! Either I’ve been using some serious garbage on my brows for so long I forgot what a good product can actually do, or this stuff is MAGIC! I love how blended it makes my brows. I’m a victim of the over plucked 90s brows and they’ve never fully returned to full luster. With this stuff I feel like it gives me some natural fluff while accentuating what little I do have left! I will recommend and def be buying again! You have a customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: hhbgg

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: Finally. My previous brow pencil was discontinued and I have tried several brands as replacements, only to be disappointed -- color not quite right, broke easily, not easy to draw on . . . Now, I am SO happy with this pencil by L'OREAL. The color is perfect, it draws on nicely, and stays on all day. I'm going to stock up on these just in case they decide to discontinue them like the other brand did with the product I had used for years. I rarely write a review for a product, but this brow pencil deserves it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary KC

customer_reviews.title: About 1/4" of product and hard as a rock.
customer_reviews.text: This must have been a defective one. There was literally only about 1/4" of product inside the tube. It was also hard as a rock, and would not transfer onto the brow area without a lot of pressure, and even then it was hardly noticeable. It broke once, when cranked it to bring more product forward, the rest of it literally FELL OUT. It measured less than 1/8". Horrible. Returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothee Crawford

customer_reviews.title: good basic
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that there is no gray. The blonde does a nice enough job though. (FYI, I was a dark brunette who is now 40%salt/60%pepper.) This goes on easily and does little lines well. It doesn't move, holds up to sweating and occasional touching. The color lasts all day. On the downside, there is very little product so you will be rebuying this often.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Try it...you’ll love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dupe for the Anastasia brow pencil that costs 3x’s as much! I usually use taupe in Anastasia (which is a ashy light brown). This L’Oréal pencil is just a tad darker, I think. I am blonde with darker roots so this works for me. If you are truly a fair blonde, it may be too dark. The product goes on great and you just need a light hand when applying. The tiny tip makes for great lines and detail and it wears wonderfully throughout the day. This pencil also lasts longer than the more expensive brand. Overall it is great brow pencil and I will definitely be ordering again!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. HH

customer_reviews.title: Good enough.
customer_reviews.text: For someone with blonde hair, it's hard to find an eyebrow pencil light enough that it doesn't look painfully obvious that you tried to fill them in a little. My brows are sparse and I find that it took a little practice to use a light hand with this, but it's great. Best I've tried - and I had tried pencils, powders, brushes, etc. A little goes a long way and I use the mascara wand on the other end to blend it a little. I loved that I can get it on Subscribe & Save!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kris M

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and one of the best brow pencils!!!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite brow pencil. Been using it for years. The pricing on Amazon has been cheaper than stores nearby in my city. This 'Brow Stylist' is easy to use and to define eyebrows in any shape. The color is good and both Dark Brunette and Brunette can be interchangeable or blended together. The color lasts all day and is a realistic brunette color and the size of the tip makes the application super easy. Love it :-)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the L'Oreal Paris Brow Stylist Definer Pencil
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the L'Oreal Paris Brow Stylist Definer Pencil! It's *almost* as good as the Anastasia brow pencil. For the cost, it's good enough for me! I'm also extremely sensitive and had gone to the Anastasia brand due to these sensitivities. I don't react to the L'Oreal pencil so that's another win! I originally ordered the Dark Brunette which was way too dark. The second time I ordered the Brunette which is a good match, but I still might go with the light brunette next time just to see if it might be a better match. It's nice that there are so many shades to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: RachelDee

customer_reviews.title: Buy it !
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I've tried Anastasia brow whiz benefits new brow pencil, Maybelline skinny brow pencil thing mililani brown pencil This is the best price rocks to Gonna get this on auto delivery my CVS and Walgreens are always sold out when it's on sale
customer_reviews.author: hulagirl

customer_reviews.title: Great color and cheaper than competition
customer_reviews.text: I like this pencil and I purchased it as a dupe for more pricey competitors. It's nothing fancy but it does the trick. My brows are dark brown/black and the dark brunette color is a perfect match. NOT REDDISH /WARM- yay!!!!! The "lead" part of the pencil is loose and will just fall out so you have to open it carefully and tilted upwards. I guess the "lead" is adjustable but mine just flops around haha. So it's nothing fancy. The spoolie works great. I would repurchase, mostly due to the color and the thin line.
customer_reviews.author: shhh

customer_reviews.title: slightly disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This product is not waterproof or smudge proof as if you mildly touch your eyebrows it will smudge or come off, it is easy to use and the color is not so dark it looks unnatural. But I was disappointed that it didn’t stay on throughout the day and started to become patchy. Price was good though.
customer_reviews.author: damion

customer_reviews.title: Love the light blonde!
customer_reviews.text: It's about time someone made a light blonde. I have found several brands whose packaging looks the same but Loreal is the only one with a light blonde. I stock up on them in case they become hard to find. I have found a light hand application controls the depth of the color also. It is close to the universal taupe advertised by some other manufacturers but is more precise. I wish the pencil would last longer but none of this type do and i really appreciate the lighter color. Since my eyebrows are an important part of my minimal makeup use I will spend the $8 every 4 to 6 weeks. To me, it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Love it! The best product I have ever used!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have brought numerous eyebrow products from the very expensive to drug store and found that nothing worked well. Some of these product, would actually pull eyebrows out. Other did not last all day. But this, L'Orèal Paris Brow Pencil is the best. I brought the brunette color, which is the color that I always buy. But they never match this product however was an exact match. I plan to buy a few more, so that I always have one at hand and never run out. I'd say that if you've been searching and spending on other eyebrow product try this one. You will love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Cebreco

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was actually really impressed. I guessed on the color judging by other reviews, which were really helpful. I'm very light brunette or dark dirty blonde. I chose the light brunette shade and it matches beautifully. I'm very fair skinned as well so I worried it would be too dark, but it was actually perfect. I only apply it once in the morning and it's good for the whole day. It's extremely easy to apply and the product itself lasts quite awhile. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Natural effect
customer_reviews.text: This is a very fine brow pencil that allow you to control exactly the thickness. The result is natural looking. I like that the pencil comes with a brush at the opposite end for blending. This helps to soothe out any obvious lines and tidies up your actual eye brows. My only complaint is that it comes off too easily and so doesn’t last all day.
customer_reviews.author: Tori P.

customer_reviews.title: I had high expectations that weren't met
customer_reviews.text: I tend to trust L'Oreal products as the brand is known for a good quality. But i wasn't impressed with this particular product. The listing says that the tip is fine to make eyebrows look more real but it is not really that fine unless you have thick eyebrows. Also, the result doesn't look as natural as other products I owned. I will keep it because it was cheap but I will definitely buy something better.
customer_reviews.author: Mariel

customer_reviews.title: Good formula, limited color range.
customer_reviews.text: Goes on smooth and pigmented. Blends out nicely with spooly. Comparable to Annistasia Beverly Hills brow wiz. However, I wish there were more color variety. I ordered "brunette" since I like "soft brown" in ABH. Unfortunately, the brunette color is dark and has a strong red undertone so it did not work for me. I think the blonde may be too light. Would have to order and see. Just wish there was a cool tone lighter brown. Formula was good though.
customer_reviews.author: Sara buys all the things

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: This would have been good if it lasted more than 2 weeks. Not to mention I took it apart and the other half of the pencil is visible inside the tube but inaccessible. So you are paying for something you can’t use. Certainly loreal can do better than this. I will be moving to a different product that is actually worth my hard earned money.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: The best brow pencil.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this eyebrow pencil over and over again. As a makeup artist/salon owner I have tried many brow pencils in my day and this one is my favorite. No smudges, thin pencil that allows a more natural look, and great value for the quality. You want your eyebrows to be on point because they really do frame your eyes; and this brow pencil is the tool you need to create a beautiful sculpted natural brow look.
customer_reviews.author: bethany armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Great product for value
customer_reviews.text: This is actually non smudge proof if you have oily skin like me BUT put on some mattifying spray after and you're good as gold. Literally my favorite product, and it is almost 65% less on cost than Anastasia and just as great. Hubs found this for me at walmart and now I have it on monthly order here.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Page

customer_reviews.title: The BEEZ KNEEZ.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best brow pencils in the market! For the price, this product is OUTSTANDING. -Precision wise, it’s unbelievable -Color wise, it’s PERFECT -Longevity speaking, it withstands it ALL. I have oily skin, and this brow pencil is the only thing that stays in place on my face throughout the day. I completely recommend this for all beauty gurus!
customer_reviews.author: Collin & Rebekah Pahle

customer_reviews.title: I especially like how fine the tip is
customer_reviews.text: I think this product delivers. I've been using it for several months now and it helps outline and shape very well. I especially like how fine the tip is. It makes for easy, smooth application. My only issue with this and many products is I can't find an eyebrow product that matches my dark brown eyebrows. This one is a tad too dark. Other pencils are either too light or to auburn. It's very frustrating and I am mixing two different pencils and/ or eyebrow product to achieve the right color, which still tends to be slightly off. Overall this is a great product and I'd definitely purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: April Mirabella

customer_reviews.title: No smudge, always sharp
customer_reviews.text: I use for both eyebrows and eyeliner. It stays all day, doesn't smudge or run unless it's rubbed. The thin twistable pencil always stays sharp and has just enough edge to it. Only downside is if it's twisted too high, the pencil breaks. I have this on subscription and it saves me from running out and running to the store last minute.
customer_reviews.author: kathyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Results!
customer_reviews.text: Finally found a brow pencil that is easy to use. Realistic results that last and if you make a mistake correcting is simple too. I have tried so many pencils and brow kits. Have had one disappointment after another until trying this one. It draws a fine line but easily. You don't have to press hard on the pencil to get that line. I really like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Bren

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last very long
customer_reviews.text: I had been buying another higher end brow pencil for the past few years and decided it was too expensive. This was a third of the price so I thought I would give it a try. It lasted less 2 months whereas my more expensive brand lasted me a year, had a wider tip and looked just as natural. The product itself is ok but the amount of product inside the pencil is deceiving and doesn't last long.
customer_reviews.author: L. Newton

customer_reviews.title: I love brow liners that have the thinner application
customer_reviews.text: I have blonde hair and nearly invisible eyebrows....I love brow liners that have the thinner application. I love that this is a much more affordable option compared to my favorite brow liner (younique moodstruck precision brow liner at $19). You younique brow liner goes on slightly more smooth than this pencil, but for less than half the cost, the L'Oreal is a no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: swoods

customer_reviews.title: Best one I've used so far
customer_reviews.text: I've spent a lot of money trying to find a brow pencil I like. This one works well. I wish it was a little smoother consistency going on, but otherwise it's a great color and looks the most natural to me out of all of the ones I've tried. I got the light brunette one and my hair color is dark brown. The color is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Emileejanel

customer_reviews.title: I now have gotten microblading and am happy to report that I no longer need to use ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been my go to brow pencil for awhile now. It's the easiest one I have found to use. By the end of the day, if you've touched/wiped your face, the color may have lightened or disappeared all together. But this is true of most brow pencils. I now have gotten microblading and am happy to report that I no longer need to use this anymore!
customer_reviews.author: KWatson

customer_reviews.title: Precision tip and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I started using this product when another brand discontinued my favorite shade of honey blonde. I'm very fair and some blonde shades are too harsh for me. The L'Oreal blonde is a perfect shade for me. Even my brunette mother commented on how natural looking this shade is and how well it complements my coloring.
customer_reviews.author: NovaKay

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  Better than I imagined
customer_reviews.text: I am older and was looking for a way to add a hint of color to my eyebrows without anyone thinking I was actually coloring my eyebrows. This is it! Point is refined so control of color is easy, the result can be as light or as dark as you choose, and it lasted all day until I removed it. What a gem of a produce and a wonderful price.
customer_reviews.author: Islandgirl

customer_reviews.title: WOW your brow at a fraction of the cost!
customer_reviews.text: Avid fan of a very expensive competitor brand that I ran out of. While waiting 7 days for it to be shipped (and a price tag of $30) Had to buy this and FELL IN LOVE! It’s just as good if not better! This brow pencil offers precision and all day wear. It doesn’t clog my pores like other waterproof liners do. Would recommend to anyone looking for a better WOW at a significantly lower price!
customer_reviews.author: CC Hustle

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite brow pencil
customer_reviews.text: I did not know this comes with two pencils. I ordered two orders so I ended up getting 4 pencils which is fine because they go very fast. I paid $8 for two which is what I pay for one in the store, so the price is very good. I would definitely recommend. This pencil stays on and is the only pencil I have found that covers my eyebrow scar fully.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Good product, wish I got more of it though
customer_reviews.text: It works. Easy to use, looks natural, and it’s a very close match to my natural brow color which I like. I do wish there was more product in the pencil itself but regardless I would still get it again. I don’t like the bristle side, it could use some improvement since it’s not thick enough to blend the product in like I can with other brow pencils that I have had before. Overall, I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Cristal

customer_reviews.title: This eyebrow helper is absolutely the BEST one available
customer_reviews.text: This eyebrow helper is absolutely the BEST one available. In fact, it is always sold out in stores around here, and so I was thrilled to find it on Amazon. This is the most natural-looking brow definer that I have ever used, and it is easy to use, stays on all day, and now that I know I can find it on Amazon I won't ever have to be without it! GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Cindyann

customer_reviews.title: It’s legit
customer_reviews.text: I was leery about buying this product from Amazon. I worry if it’s legit or not. Since it’s just eyebrow pencil (vs eyeliner), I went for it and bought the dark brunette, my usual. I’ve been using it daily for about a week. No issues with breakouts. Eyebrows not harmed, face still intact. Now back to being serious... Color matches well, satisfactory staying power. Prices are comparable to the big box retailers.
customer_reviews.author: Chaos Queen

customer_reviews.title: Easiest brow product, just get the right color!
customer_reviews.text: What's not to love here? I watched a few youtube videos on this and went with a lighter brunette color just in case and it is perfect. Very easy smooth application, wears all day for me even in the summer heat and can be built up or darkened if I care to. I prefer pencils over brow pomades as they seem easier to control the shape of your brows. This one is perfect for me like so many other L'Oreal products. Another winner from them!
customer_reviews.author: Glama Puss

customer_reviews.title: Too Waxy
customer_reviews.text: I keep this in my purse for touch ups as I’m 60 and have thinning brows, but honestly I don’t see the quality of my Anastasia brows . Ok for a back up.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Great brow pencil!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best brow pencil I have used. I have tried many! They are either too thick, too soft, too hard, too smudgy, too dark, too light, too expensive, etc. So far, this is as good as it gets for me for now and I’ve been using it for years or since it first came out. Especially for the outside of my brow, then I may fill it in with a more gel like pencil. So, I am thankful!
customer_reviews.author: awesome4u63

customer_reviews.title: The peen is really nice but they didn't advertise the color very well
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the quality of the eyebrow pen and the brand is awesome but they didn't show the color of the pen well enough. I would suggest looking at it in-store so that you can color match better and then buy it online. Other than that this thing is awesome I just wish I didn't have to return it and get another one.
customer_reviews.author: mrs. orchard

customer_reviews.title: works ok
customer_reviews.text: I am having a hard time finding something that works as smoothly as the traditional pencil. This one works ok, the color is good, the pencil draws on brows ok, I think it's less even/smooth than the traditional pencil. It has a brush on one end, but more of a shaping brush and less of a blending brush. I needed a spare for travel etc so this one is fine. I'm not sure it's any better or worse than the angled style.
customer_reviews.author: MDK

customer_reviews.title: Good color!
customer_reviews.text: As I read someone else say- this is the closest thing to Maybelline Define-A-Brow Eyebrow Pencil in Dark Blonde Ive tried- which is often hard to find or VERY high priced anymore. I am not sure how long this lasts just yet, but I like how it applies and I like the color.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon J

customer_reviews.title: Product great, amazon delivery fine. But delivery lies about handing to resident
customer_reviews.text: Product is a great dark blonde, kinda taupe, no red tones which I like. Blends well and looks natural. Amazon delivery likes to lie and post "handed directly to resident" this is ongoing issue with Amazon delivery. They have been notified 3 times and their delivery ppl still post the delivery falsehood. It was left on the porch.
customer_reviews.author: Fire it up

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and she really like it. The color fits great on her and she said it's really easy to use. The only bad thing is that it come with so little quantity of product. Also she says that it doesn't stay on very well, if she touches her eyebrows it comes off.
customer_reviews.author: carlos

customer_reviews.title: Barely puts off color.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered “blonde”. It’s super thin. Which wouldn’t be an issue if the product output and pigment was better. It’s like I have to go over and over the area to produce enough color. I don’t like my brows super dark, I prefer a natural look but I do like them to look finished and sleek so I’m not hard to please. If the pencil wasn’t so hard and “roll up crayon” like it would be a good pencil. Obviously this is just my personal opinion, others have loved it. I did somehow get 2 of them in my package and I thought this was only for one. So that was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but runs out quickly.
customer_reviews.text: This eyebrow pencil works pretty well. It’s easy to apply and the skinny tip makes it look more natural. The only thing I don’t like about it is how little product there actually is. It ran out way faster that I expected it too. For what they charge, you should get twice as much.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as ABH Brow Wiz.
customer_reviews.text: As someone who's used ABH brow wiz, I can tell you this holds up just as well, and the pencil is just as thin, so it's easy to make hair strokes. It's waterproof and lasts all day. I have oily skin so this is a big deal for me. And for half the price it was a no brainer for me to switch from the brow wiz to this. Absolutely love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dark Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: What was I thinking?
customer_reviews.text: A small pasty crayon is what this is! Tiniest piece of it too ... I bought it to fill in a small portion of my “still there and looking good, browns” so with that said, I’m wondering what is the big deal with this product? Any other can deliver so nothing special here :(
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Hust

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake of buying a regular brown eyeliner for my brows and it was hard to use, when I got this one I LOVED IT immediately! Super thin pencil and easy to use. Usually buy wet n wild retractable for a dollar but they’re always out, this is $4 more but like it much better. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: I'm sold
customer_reviews.text: I was buying $20 eybrow pencils and then found this... i seriously cant tell the difference. It wears nicely throughout the day. The stick is harder which I love so you can make individual lines and or use different pressures to get desired look. You can get a very natural look with light pressure and individual strokes or glam it up with more definition and precision. I'm sold.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: An OK product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this brow pencil after reading a bunch of reviews. To me, it is just an ok. It is a super thin pencil and not of a much product in it, this will run out quickly if you are like me, a person who needs to do daily brow touch ups. You must be very careful when applying, must do it lightly or it will break. Color wise, I am happy with the color. Worth a try? Yes, definitely. Will I purchase more? Not sure as I will for sure be giving a try to the other brands out there.
customer_reviews.author: Zeljka

customer_reviews.title: You can buy this from the dollar store. Don't waste your money on this
customer_reviews.text: Cheap. Loreal is a big name so I figured I'd give it a try and it's legit the same quality the sell at your local dollar tree. It's smudges and looks very obvious and there is really nothing you can do about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Long lasting and doesn't smear.
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance when ordering this and I'm very glad I did! The dark brown color is spot on without any red hues. It goes on very smoothly and stays put all day. As long as you use a light feathery touch it looks very natural. The harder you press, the darker it becomes. Be sure to use the eyebrow spoolie on the other end.
customer_reviews.author: artist

customer_reviews.title: Just the right amount of pigment
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dupe for the Anastasia Microbrow pencil. It deposits just the right amount of pigment so that you don’t go overboard too easily. It blends smoothly as well so you don’t have harsh lines. I use this to outline my brow and then use the thicker brow pencil from L’Oreal to fill in the rest of my brows. I set with a powder, then finish up with a brow gel and my brows stay put all day.
customer_reviews.author: hurgleburgle

customer_reviews.title: Not enough product.
customer_reviews.text: This is my all time favorite eyebrow pencil but there is not enough product and it barely lasts me a week. I can't afford to keep buying one each week. If nothing is done soon I'll probably start looking for something else although I will be very disappointed because it's the only brow pencil I've found in years that I actually love.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Theres much better out there
customer_reviews.text: Pencil ran out really fast. I bought the taupe colored elf pencil and it is pretty much the same thing but its lasted me 3X longer than this l'oreal pencil. This one is very cheaply made and I broke it the first time I put it on and had to use my husbands tools to fix the plastic part that twists up the product. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: MissRose

customer_reviews.title: To thin it breaks very easily
customer_reviews.text: I never give bad reviews but got to be honest For other consumers. Very disappointed it did not last. The tiny skinny delicate crayon was so light and breakable I had to keep twisting it to get more after it broke after every stroke ...in 3 days it was gone. If I did it to lightly it wouldn’t draw.
customer_reviews.author: Hope Marie

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I have no eyebrow hair. This was very easy and precise. I like the thin tip it makes it very easy to apply
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: This one is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This eyebow pencil is easy to use and I picked the right color. I like that it has the brush attached on the other end of the pencil. I hate buying eyebrow pencils as they are such a crapshoot. This one turned out to be a good pick. I do recommend this eyebrow pencil.
customer_reviews.author: B. Walter

customer_reviews.title: paid for two and only received one!
customer_reviews.text: I always order these.. I always order two.. I have always received both eyeliners in the past.. Today I received my order and only one is in the package.. However I was still charged for two! I really hate having to return things or having to contact customer service. I spend a ton of money using amazon.. Im not a very happy customer and I am considering using amazon much less. I mean for the love of God its eyeliner. I ordered TWO ..That is not a very complicated order!
customer_reviews.author: anonymous1

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to NYX Micro Brow Pencil
customer_reviews.text: I usually purchase the NYX Micro Brow Pencil, this one was very similar for a better price. The pencil tip twists up and is very thin, making it easy to use. The pencil goes on very smooth and lasts all day for me until I wash my face. I will be repurchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Meg RTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is Ultra fine, easy to use and long lasting. I purchased a dark brunette but it’s more like an ash black. I was expecting it to be more of a very dark brown but there was nothing brunette about it. You also get a little bit of product as some may expect a large amount but that’s fine by me because it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Almost dupe for Anastasia Brow Wiz
customer_reviews.text: This is a very close dupe to the Anastasia Brow Wiz for less than half the price. The colors are a bit different, but the texture and application are very close. I usually use soft brown in the Brow Wiz and have been using brunette in this pencil. I’m going to try the light brown and see if thats a better match, but I’ve been able to make brunette work with a light hand. I would definitely recommend this for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Megan McM

customer_reviews.title: Great eyebrow pencil!
customer_reviews.text: Have always loved this brow pencil. Color matches well and small tip makes it look more natural. This product was new in package and as described by seller. Received when expected
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Slightly patchy, but with some brow gel it should be too bad.
customer_reviews.text: Naturally a blonde, but I am using this product with a black wig for a cosplay of mine. I assume for people who are talented at doing their brows would be able to make good use out of this, but I am still learning as I have no need of doing my brows so it is a little nerve racking. Going to be getting a brow gel as well to make it look more natural aside from using this liner to shape them.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon Kunkel

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of brow pencils that are two to three times as expensive and this has become my go-to product. The pencil is very fine for defining and the pigment stays on well throughout the day. Biggest flaw is that I've had a few pencils now that have the brush end pop off when you remove the cap which is annoying. It goes back into place but is inconvenient. Overall, very good product and value.
customer_reviews.author: kfaulkenham

customer_reviews.title: Nice thin pencil
customer_reviews.text: I like how thin this pencil is. Makes for easy filling of the brows and creating more natural looking strokes. Only complaint is the lenhth of the pencil being very short...doesn't last long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Janette

customer_reviews.title: With my brows thinning and turning gray as I grow ...
customer_reviews.text: With my brows thinning and turning gray as I grow older, I needed something to enhance my brows. This really does the trick! It helps me not to look so old! Covers those grays, fills out my brow!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie D.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I had been using brow powder for a few years and was looking for something that might be quicker to apply. This was just what I was looking for. It is quick and easy to apply. The small brush end really finishes off the application nicely for a natural look. I think this is also longer lasting than what I was previously using.
customer_reviews.author: Chris in KS

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I've been using pencils for a very long time. I've tried very high end and drugstore. I must say this one is just as good as the more expensive brands while also being really affordable. Purchased my second one and so far I'm really happy with how easy this pencil makes it to fill in and shape my brows.
customer_reviews.author: daisyG

customer_reviews.title: Get it. One of the better brow pencils
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! I use it every day. It is not too soft and not to hard The color is perfect for me (dark brunette) and the price is right. I used to use SPIKED by MAC. This is great too but it cost over 20 dollars for 1. This is best quality for price. Just get it. 😊
customer_reviews.author: PKPR

customer_reviews.title: Love this pencil... not enough product...
customer_reviews.text: I do love this eye pencil. I love the small tip - it makes it easier to be more precise. Here's my only problem... if you're using this pencil almost everyday, like myself, you will go through the product quickly... if you're looking for an eye pencil with a lot of product, I wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Farrar

customer_reviews.title: Great product, tends to be darker than the packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyebrow pencil. The pencil/brush combo allows you to pencil in the makeup and then brush it out to distribute evenly and ensure a natural look. I originally went with the Light Brunette color, but it was very dark!! I switched to the dark blonde and am very happy with the color. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Good dupe
customer_reviews.text: I always used the Anatastia brow pencil but I was looking for a cheap alternative. This is a winner. The only complaint I have is that i run out of the product so quickly because (i have a lot of eyebrow) and the tip is so thin i use it a up lot faster. The colors also look nice. Might say a little less pigmented than an Anastatia one, but good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly D

customer_reviews.title: Best product
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly precise application. Best color match & easy to use. The product just twists up & applies easily. There is a spoolie at one end to brush brows with but also dubs as an eraser for small mistakes. Definitely my favorite eyebrow product. I buy a lot of these!
customer_reviews.author: Stan C.

product_meta.title: L'Oreal Paris Makeup Brow Stylist Definer Waterproof Eyebrow Pencil, Ultra-Fine Mechanical Pencil, Draws Tiny Brow Hairs & Fills in Sparse Areas & Gaps, Brunette, 0.003 Ounce (1 Count)
product_meta.description:
Size:1 Count| Color:BrunetteBrow Stylist Definer makes the art of the brow easy. Shape brows with this ultra-fine tip pencil - a perfect tool to draw tiny brow hairs and shape brows for a well-defined look. Mechanical and retractable pencil with spoolie brush for combing and blending the perfect brow. Packaging may vary. What you receive may not be what is reflected on site.

Ultra-fine Tip Mechanical Pencil and Spoolie
Draws Tiny Brow Hairs
Precisely Defines and Easily Blends
Waterproof

Start with clean, brushed brows. Using the Ultra-fine tip pencil, draw the outline of your brow shape. Fill in the gap with light feathered strokes. Comb up following your arch shape using the soft blending brush for a more defined look. 

Warning: Eye cosmetics in a scratched, infected or irritated eye and scratches from cosmetic eye applicators can lead to eye damage, and in extreme cases, even blindness. If your eye is scratched, stop using all eye cosmetics and go to an ophthalmologist immediately. Never apply this product in a moving vehicle.
feature_bullets: Brow stylist definer eyebrow pencil: Ultra fine self sharpening mechanical brow pencil draws on tiny brow hairs to fill in sparse areas or gaps and spoolie brush styles and defines brow shape
For brows that are flawlessly, naturally you: Brow Definer mechanical pencil is waterproof, ophthalmologist tested and suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers

Create your perfect eye makeup look with our collection of Voluminous mascaras, achieve sleek lines with smudge proof eyeliner, define your brows and discover eye shadow palettes with shades made for every eye color

Because you're worth it: L'Oreal Paris Makeup helps you create the look you want with our full line of makeup including foundations, concealers, highlighter makeup, brow pencils, eye shadow palettes, lipsticks and much more
Perfect to pair with: Voluminous Original Volume Building Mascara, uniquely formulated to resist clumping, soften and build lashes up to 5X their natural thickness

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
